lead_paragraph: Ben Gordon scored a career-high 40 points off the bench to lead the host Chicago Bulls to a 109-103 victory last night against the Miami Heat, who lost Dwyane Wade to a sprained wrist in the first quarter.
snippet: Ben Gordon scored a career-high 40 points off the bench to lead the host Chicago Bulls to a 109-103 victory last night against the Miami Heat, who lost Dwyane Wade to a sprained wrist in the first quarter.
